name: Giant Centipede
movement: 30 feet on the ground and climbing
description: A small, agile centipede with a venomous bite, it has natural armor that gives it a resilient appearance.
memorable: Its bite can paralyze victims, making it particularly dangerous during ambushes.
goals: Typically hunts smaller creatures or defends its territory.
relations: May be found in close proximity to other small beasts or insects.
environment: Commonly found in damp or dark environments, such as caves or forests.
strengths: Has a potent bite that inflicts piercing and poison damage.
weaknesses: Very low physical strength and intelligence, limiting its combat capability.
attacks: Bite attack that delivers piercing damage and potential poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Paralyzing poison on a successful bite that incapacitate victims.
senses: Possesses keen senses that allow it to detect creatures within 30 feet.
skills: Skilled in stealth, capable of hiding effectively in its environment.
additional_information: Swift Hunter ability for quick movement towards targets.
Has a poor constitution but evades through agility.
Can incapacitate larger foes despite its small size.
Utilizes ambush tactics to maximize its bite's effectiveness.
Natural armor provides some resilience against physical attacks.
test_queries: small venomous insect with paralyzing bite
swift hunter that can poison its prey
dangerous small beast found in dark places
